    • Method Detail

      • registerEventPattern

        void registerEventPattern(EpSparqlQuery epSparqlQuery)
        Register a new event pattern.
        Throws:
        DcepManagementException - if the pattern has errors

      • unregisterEventPattern

        void unregisterEventPattern(String queryId)
        Unregister an existing event pattern. This method silently does nothing if there is no pattern with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        queryId -

      • getRegisteredEventPattern

        EpSparqlQuery getRegisteredEventPattern(String queryId)
                                        throws DcepManagementException
        Get a previously registered event pattern.
        Throws:
        DcepManagementException - if there is no pattern with the given ID

      • getRegisteredEventPatterns

        Map<String,EpSparqlQuery> getRegisteredEventPatterns()
        Get a collection of all currently registered event patterns.
